creator: Jean-Francois.Lamy@teximus.com
text:
On Windows 2000 SP1, with Sun Java JDK 1.3 (or JBuilder4 Foundation Java JDK 
1.3), JSPC does not appear to be able to compile even the jsp examples included 
with the distribution; at first I tried using -webapp, then an individual file, 
with the same result.

I would appreciate seeing the command line and console output for compiling 
jakarta-tomcat-4.0-b1\webapps\examples\jsp\source.jsp !!!

jfl

creator: justyna.horwat@sun.com
text:
There was a problem with the jspc classpath and servlet.jar was not being 
picked up properly. It is now fixed in Tomcat 4.0. 

Here is a sample jspc command line for compiling snoop.jsp into a tmp directory:

C:\Tomcat\jakarta-tomcat-4.0\build\bin>jspc -d tmp ..\webapps\examples\jsp\snp\s
noop.jsp

creator: tilo.christ@med.siemens.de
text: This sounds like a duplicate of #821
